content: It is said that Anhui Telecom has blocked Apple's iMessage and FaceTime, causing many functions between Apple devices to be unable to work properly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of 17:00 on the 19th, the water level at Guilin station rose to 148.55 meters, exceeding the 148.4 meters during the 1998 Lijiang River flood and 2.55 meters above the warning level. This is the largest flood in Guilin since 1998.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Workers' collapse in an instant
On June 20, Shanghai Manner Coffee exposed two incidents of employees arguing with customers waiting for meals.
A male employee of the Sika Deer 1047 store argued with a woman waiting for meals after being urged to order, then snatched her cell phone, insulted her and fought with her.
A female employee of the Weihai Road 716 store threw coffee powder at a woman waiting for meals and yelled in disarray.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Under the relevant discussion, netizens expressed their support for the clerk

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guilin’s current flood situation
According to people at the scene, if a Douyin live broadcast room captures water conditions from last night to now, the live broadcast room will be immediately banned for 10 minutes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was revealed on V2EX that ByteDance’s employee digital office platform Feilian would take screenshots in the background

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 19, in Guilin, Guangxi, a female salesperson was electrocuted to death at a pharmacy in front of the Jiashan Vegetable Market due to flooding caused by heavy rain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 19, Meizhou, Guangdong. Residents of Jiaoling County packed up their belongings and fled in panic after hearing that the reservoir was about to burst.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People from She County, Huangshan City, Anhui Province submitted a post saying that a flood was happening in the area. Currently, only the street office called to ask people to move, but no shelter was designated. The only official news that could be seen online was about saving a pig.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 19, Wang Cailiang, a part-time professor at the School of Law of Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics and a lawyer at Cailiang Law Firm, released a video criticizing the recent establishment of police-tax integrated combat centers in various places.
He said that the General Secretary said that the people are the country, and now taxpayers have become the target of combat. Law enforcement officers should understand that it is the people who feed you, not the people as enemies. This move is suspected of being unconstitutional and should be banned and held accountable.
The video has been deleted from the entire network.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 20, Zhongchi Township, Wuping County, Longyan, Fujian
Disaster victims said that after the CCTV reporter took photos yesterday, the disaster relief work stopped today.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Due to the flood, many places in Huangshan were cut off from water and electricity. Residents of Gaojing Village said that many houses were washed away and many people were missing. In Sencun Township and Shaolian Township, the high-voltage lines collapsed, resulting in no electricity, no network, and no signal in the entire township.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 19, in Tangshan, Hebei, local taxi drivers set up a blocking point at the airport highway exit to protest against online ride-hailing and illegal taxis stealing their business. Whenever they saw an online ride-hailing car, they would stop it and ask the transportation management staff nearby to conduct an inspection, while taxis would be allowed to pass.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 18, the China Women's Foundation Development Association announced the details of the funds for the May Hemophilia Home Relief Project.
Among them, in May, the foundation received donations of 187,495.03 yuan from Tencent's caring netizens. 2,400 yuan was allocated to each of the eight hemophilia patients in distress. However, the Red Apple Chorus Art Troupe, which had 0 rehearsals and 0 performances in May, had a total expenditure of 159,618.43 yuan, which aroused doubts from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In May 2024, China's commercial housing sales area fell by 16.1% year-on-year, down 54% from the 2021 peak, returning to the 2012 level.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 18, Jiangxi. Wu, a public official of the Nanchang Petition Bureau, did not pay parking fees for many years and was stopped by the property staff. Wu then drove his car against the property staff and left.
On the 19th, the Nanchang Petition Bureau announced that Wu had apologized and was conducting an in-depth investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 20, Beijing. A Zhongzhi investor came to Beijing for negotiation, but he was emotionally broken because he could not see his leader and tried to commit suicide by taking pills.

content: Songyuan Town, Meizhou, Guangdong, after the flood

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 19, Guangdong. The Aojiang Town Government sold the collective land of Longzhou Village to install photovoltaic power plants without the consent of the villagers. The villagers gathered at the town government to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 19 (Released) Yiyang, Hunan. On the afternoon of the 16th, 89-year-old Luo Lianhua died in Taohuajiang Town. In the early morning of the 18th, the deputy mayor led hundreds of people to break into the old man’s home, snatched the old man’s body and forcibly cremated it without any official documents or law enforcement certificates.
It is suspected to be related to the current local vigorous promotion of funeral reforms

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to media reports, the owners of the community involved responded that the property management refused to evacuate and violently obstructed the handover with the new property management, so the owners refused to pay the parking fee. At the time of the incident, the public official was in a hurry to take the child to the hospital for a follow-up examination.
